mapper.select: select mid, mname, mpassword, memail, mtel, mphone, mdate, mzip, maddress, mdetailAddress, mrole, agree1 from member where mid=#{mid}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mid, mname, mpassword, memail, mtel, mphone, mdate, mzip, maddress, mdetailAddress, mrole, agree1, agree2, agree3) values(#{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, #{memail}, #{mtel}, #{mphone}, sysdate, #{mzip}, #{maddress}, #{mdetailAddress}, #{mrole}, #{agree1}, #{agree2}, #{agree3})
